scripts.clean: rm -rf dist node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.cap:init: npx cap init app-kick-off com.example.appkickoff --web-dir=dist || true
scripts.android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap run android
scripts.android:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:build: cd android && ./gradlew build && echo '‚úÖ APK built: android/app/build/outputs/apk/'
scripts.android:build:release: cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && echo '‚úÖ Bundle built: android/app/build/outputs/bundle/'
scripts.android:debug: adb shell input keyevent 82 && npm run android:logs
scripts.ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap run ios
scripts.ios:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync ios
scripts.ios:build: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Release
scripts.web:preview: npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.info:versions: echo '=== Node ===' && node -v && echo '=== NPM ===' && npm -v && echo '=== Capacitor ===' && npx cap --version && echo '=== TypeScript ===' && npx tsc --version
scripts.help: echo 'üì± App Kick Off - Available Commands' && echo 'üöÄ Development:' && echo '  npm run dev              - Start dev server (http://localhost:3001)' && echo '  npm run dev:debug        - Start with debug logs' && echo 'üî® Building:' && echo '  npm run build            - Build web bundle' && echo '  npm run build:report     - Build and show size' && echo '  npm run clean            - Clean everything' && echo 'üì± Android:' && echo '  npm run android          - Full: build + sync + run' && echo '  npm run android:dev      - Dev mode with dev config' && echo '  npm run android:sync     - Build + sync only' && echo '  npm run android:build    - Build APK' && echo '  npm run android:build:release - Build release bundle' && echo 'üçé iOS:' && echo '  npm run ios              - Full: build + sync + run' && echo '  npm run ios:dev          - Dev mode with dev config' && echo '  npm run ios:sync         - Build + sync only' && echo '  npm run ios:build        - Build for iOS' && echo 'üåê Web:' && echo '  npm run web              - Start dev server' && echo '  npm run web:build        - Build for production' && echo '  npm run web:preview      - Build and preview' && echo 'üõ†Ô∏è  Tools:' && echo '  npm run type-check       - Check TypeScript' && echo '  npm run info             - Show Capacitor info' && echo '  npm run info:versions    - Show versions'
